Bora Dugic - Diskografija (1980-2011)

1980 - Carobna Frula

1983 - Virtuozna Frula

1988 - Secanje Na Dizon

1989 - Nezno Prolece

1993 - The Art Of Bora Dugic

1996 - Cari Rumunskog Folklora

2004 - Izmedju Jave I Sna

2011 - Zauvek I Posle


Albumi 1983 - Virtuozna Frula i 1988 - Secanje Na Dizon nisu komplentni,nazalost,ostali su kompletni..



Bora Dugic (born on June 10, 1949) is a Serbian musician and flautist having released a number of CD's and records as well as having performed at countless concerts.
In 2004 he celebrated 35 years of artistic work by a grand solo concert "The Play of Spirit" at the Sava Centar in Belgrade. In 2008 he appeared at the 2008 Eurovision Song Contest alongside Jelena TomaÃ…Â¡eviÃ„â€¡.
